templates.name: Mintlify Documentation Agent
templates.shortDescription: AI agent that answers questions from your Mintlify documentation with code examples
templates.fullDescription: Transform your Mintlify documentation into an intelligent Slack assistant. This template provides a fully configured agent that can answer questions, provide code examples, and guide users through your documentation directly in Slack.

templates.name: Kubernetes Operations Agent
templates.shortDescription: Monitor and manage Kubernetes clusters directly from Slack with intelligent alerts
templates.fullDescription: A comprehensive Kubernetes management agent that brings cluster operations to Slack. Monitor deployments, get intelligent alerts, debug issues, and execute kubectl commands safely from your Slack workspace.

templates.name: GitHub PR Review Agent
templates.shortDescription: Automated code review assistant that provides intelligent feedback on pull requests
templates.fullDescription: Enhance your code review process with an AI-powered agent that automatically reviews pull requests, suggests improvements, and checks for common issues. Integrates seamlessly with your GitHub workflow.

templates.name: Sales CRM Assistant
templates.shortDescription: AI-powered sales assistant that integrates with Salesforce and HubSpot
templates.fullDescription: Streamline your sales workflow with an intelligent agent that can update CRM records, fetch customer information, and provide insights directly in Slack. Works with both Salesforce and HubSpot.

templates.name: Incident Response Coordinator
templates.shortDescription: Orchestrate incident response with automated runbooks and team coordination
templates.fullDescription: A comprehensive incident management agent that helps coordinate response efforts, execute runbooks, and maintain communication during critical incidents. Integrates with PagerDuty, Datadog, and other monitoring tools.

templates.name: Data Analysis Assistant
templates.shortDescription: Query databases and generate insights using natural language in Slack
templates.fullDescription: Transform natural language questions into SQL queries and get instant data insights. This agent connects to your databases, runs analysis, and creates visualizations directly in Slack.

templates.name: HR Onboarding Assistant
templates.shortDescription: Automate employee onboarding with intelligent task tracking and resource sharing
templates.fullDescription: Streamline your onboarding process with an AI agent that guides new employees, tracks task completion, and answers HR questions. Integrates with common HR systems and document stores.

templates.name: Security Vulnerability Scanner
templates.shortDescription: Continuous security scanning with intelligent vulnerability prioritization
templates.fullDescription: Keep your applications secure with an agent that continuously scans for vulnerabilities, prioritizes risks, and suggests remediation steps. Integrates with popular security tools and CI/CD pipelines.
